channel.title: Starting Scar bot, Need help
channel.description: Sorry for my english, i'm french : :mad: So, I used Aryan a long time ago but I'm not able to use scar. I don't understand it. What i need to run scar perfectly. Latest version? My friend told me to download scarescape... but what's that? where can i download it. I need a good tutorial and good links to download the lastest version. Thx :)

item.title: Starting Scar bot, Need help
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

there is no scarscape anymore, but you can just download SCAR from www.dylock.net/scar/ and then download some scripts from this forum, run them and your good to go

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Scar bot, Need help
item.dc:creator: @Gravey Gravey
item.description:
@Gravey wrote:

Try registering at villavu forums, there’s lots of tutorials and scripts there for scar, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,10674.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Starting Scar bot, Need help

item.description:

Sorry for my english, i’m french : :mad:
So, I used Aryan a long time ago but I’m not able to use scar. I don’t understand it. What i need to run scar perfectly. Latest version? My friend told me to download scarescape… but what’s that? where can i download it. I need a good tutorial and good links to download the lastest version. Thx
